attributes.action: Adopt European rules regarding to  whom  you can leave your estate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I understand European countries have a system where people cannot exclude their children from their Will. In England you can leave it to who you want which causes huge family sorrow, quarrels and ill feeling and leaves those  left out feeling unloved and very often, wondering why.
Our system leaves all family members vunerable to being excluded and is very open to abuse, the European system would effectively stop this from happening.
